message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this amazing product with you. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $7,500. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,500. I'm willing to pay that price, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $6,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $7,000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,200. I'm willing to pay that price, but I really think that's the maximum I can go. Can you consider it?

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $6,200. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $6,800. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your last concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, so I'll offer $6,400. Can you consider it?

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $6,400. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $6,600. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your last concession, Alice, but I'm still trying to get the best deal I can. I'm willing to go up to $6,500, but no more. Can you consider it?

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $6,500. I'm willing to make one final concession and offer it to you for $6,700. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product. What do you think?
Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to work with me, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than $6,400. I'm willing to meet you in the middle one last time. Can you consider it?
